Package org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices.oath

Class OathDeviceSettings

  • java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • OathDeviceSettings

        public OathDeviceSettings()
        Empty no-arg constructor for Jackson usage, due to presence of non-default constructor.

      • OathDeviceSettings

        public OathDeviceSettings​(String sharedSecret,
                          String deviceName,
                          long lastLogin,
                          int counter)
        Parameters:
        sharedSecret - The device's shared secret. Non-null value.
        deviceName - An arbitrary identifier for the device. Non-null value.
        lastLogin - The last login time, for TOTP algorithm usage. Non-null value.
        counter - The counter value, for HOTP algorithm usage. Non-null value.

    • Method Detail

      • setSharedSecret

        public void setSharedSecret​(String sharedSecret)
        Set the secret value which is shared between the OATH device and an authenticating module.
        Parameters:
        sharedSecret - The shared secret. Can not be null.

      • setDeviceName

        public void setDeviceName​(String deviceName)
        Set an arbitrary identifier for the OATH device.
        Parameters:
        deviceName - The identifier. Can not be null.

      • setLastLogin

        public void setLastLogin​(long lastLogin,
                         TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Set the last login time when this device was used. This is relevant for authentication using the TOTP algorithm.
        Parameters:
        lastLogin - The last login time in ms. Can not be null.
        timeUnit - The time units.

      • setCounter

        public void setCounter​(int counter)
        Set the counter value for this device. This is relevant for authentication using the HOTP algorithm.
        Parameters:
        counter - The counter value. Can not be null.

      • setTruncationOffset

        public void setTruncationOffset​(int truncationOffset)
        Set the truncation offset for this device.
        Parameters:
        truncationOffset - The truncation offset.

      • setChecksumDigit

        public void setChecksumDigit​(boolean checksumDigit)
        Set the checksum digit for this device.
        Parameters:
        checksumDigit - The checksum digit.

      • getLastLogin

        Get the counter value for this device. This is relevant for authentication using the HOTP algorithm.

        Returns:

      • getClockDriftSeconds

        public int getClockDriftSeconds()
        The calculated drift between the device and this server, in time steps. Used to implement the resynchronisation protocol described in RFC 6238, section 6.
        Returns:
        the current observed time-step drift for this TOTP client.

      • setClockDriftSeconds

        public void setClockDriftSeconds​(int clockDriftSeconds)
        Sets the observed time-step drift between this device and the server when performing TOTP authentication.
        Parameters:
        clockDriftSeconds - the observed time drift in time-steps.
        See Also:
        getClockDriftSeconds()
